definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
key (on a piano or computer keyboard)/button (on a mouse or other device)/chemical bond/linchpin

sentences.english: Can use hotkeys or automatic timer from the screen capture.
sentences.chinese: 可以用热键或自动记时器从屏幕上抓图。

sentences.english: Never used hotkeys and it intrigued me not a little.
sentences.chinese: 从未使用热键，它激起我兴趣不小。

sentences.english: The Video Capture Hotkey lets you assign a button that will record movies of the game.
sentences.chinese: 视频捕捉热键，让你分配一个按钮，将记录游戏电影。

sentences.english: Fixed an issue where the other player in a coop games hotkeys were always set to 5.
sentences.chinese: 修正合作玩家的热键总是自动设置为数字5的问题。

sentences.english: You can switch between different modes using predefined hotkeys.
sentences.chinese: 您可以使用预定义之间切换热键不同的模式。

sentences.english: Such a code window can be hidden and then recalled through a hot key.
sentences.chinese: 该代码窗口可被隐藏和通过按动热键重现。

sentences.english: The baneling explode exactly when you press the key, no targeting needed, no delay.
sentences.chinese: 当你按下热键，爆蛉会没有目的性的爆炸。
这里没有提供热键鼠标消息。

sentences.english: Windows operations Hotkeys to minimize, maximize, restore the active window.
sentences.chinese: 视窗操作热键，尽量减少，最大限度地恢复活动窗口。

sentences.english: When you want to end the benchmark, press the Hotkey again.
sentences.chinese: 当您要结束的基准时，再次按下热键。

sentences.english: You can run a task from a hotkey .
sentences.chinese: 您可以执行任务，从一个热键。

sentences.english: But the single hotkey set by you will kill both processes at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 但单热键设置你将杀死这两个过程在同一时间。

sentences.english: Human Torch - Ludwigs Flamethrower, Shoots fire and starts people a blaze (Bind key for power).
sentences.chinese: 人肉喷火器向敌人喷火，需绑定热键。

sentences.english: Hotkeys, actions, menu, and buttons organizers.
sentences.chinese: 热键，操作，菜单和按钮组织者。

definition: plug-in (software or hardware)/to plug in a component
a control (e.g. button, text box etc) (computing)
